summary: The module contains slow integration tests that load Stable Diffusion XL image‑to‑image and refiner pipelines from a single‑file checkpoint, execute inference on a sample image, and verify that the generated results are statistically identical to those produced by the original multi‑file pretrained models.
business_intent: Validate that single‑file model packaging for Stable Diffusion XL image‑to‑image generation works correctly and delivers the same quality as the standard model, enabling reliable, streamlined deployment of diffusion models in production environments.
